import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { FiShoppingCart } from "react-icons/fi"; import { Box, Heading, FormControl, FormLabel, Input, Textarea, Button, Select, Divider, NumberInput, NumberInputField, NumberInputStepper, NumberIncrementStepper, NumberDecrementStepper, Link, Radio, RadioGroup, Stack, Flex, Center, HStack, IconButton, Badge, } from '@chakra-ui/react'; const CoursePostingForm = () => { const [title, setTitle] = useState(''); const [author, setAuthor] = useState(''); const [image, setImage] = useState(null); const [promotionalImage, setPromotionalImage] = useState(null); const [date, setDate] = useState(''); const [category1, setCategory1] = useState(''); const [category2, setCategory2] = useState(''); const [category3, setCategory3] = useState(''); const [language, setLanguage] = useState(''); const [description, setDescription] = useState(''); const [price, setPrice] = useState(''); const [level, setLevel] = useState('beginner'); const handleSubmit = event => { event.preventDefault(); // handle form submission here }; function handleImageUpload(event) { const file = event.target.files[0]; if (file) { const reader = new FileReader(); reader.readAsDataURL(file); reader.onload = () => { setImage(reader.result); }; } } function handlePromotionalImageUpload(event) { const file = event.target.files[0]; if (file) { const reader = new FileReader(); reader.readAsDataURL(file); reader.onload = () => { setPromotionalImage(reader.result); }; } } return ( Course Website Courses About Contact } aria-label="Cart" variant="ghost" size="lg" /> 0 Intended Learners Course Content Course Landing Page Pricing
Title of Course

Your course landing page is the page first seen by a user or an intending learner when the click your course. Make sure it is compelling enough to drive learners to enroll in your course.

Course Title setTitle(event.target.value)} /> Course Description setAuthor(event.target.value)} /> {/* Image URL setImage(event.target.value)} /> */} {/* Date setDate(event.target.value)} /> */} Language {/* Description
